title: 游戏崩溃
txt_content:
本帖最后由 02029102 于 2020-5-23 08:53 编辑 

只加了一个怪物属性，不知道为什么崩溃了了
崩溃日志：---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// You're mean.

Time: 5/23/20 8:45 AM
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NullPointerException: Exception in server tick loop
        at toast.mobProperties.util.EffectHelper.addItemText(EffectHelper.java:68)

        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:526)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:821)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:

replies.author: maliu123
replies.txt_content: [极简血量显示]Neat+1.4-17 - 副本.jar 貌似出现了点兼容性问题，删掉试试

replies.author: maliu123
replies.txt_content: 从日志中看到最醒目的错误就是丢了个时间线程

maliu123 发表于 2020-5-23 09:07
[极简血量显示]Neat+1.4-17 - 副本.jar 貌似出现了点兼容性问题，删掉试试
哦，知道了
